Widget.Name: Text
Widget.RawString: - can guard other units{cr}- can operate Siege Engines{cr}- can capture Carts and unmanned Siege Engines{cr}- use Torches against buildings, which are resupplied at Barracks and Outposts{cr}- can take over damaged Outposts{cr}- can open enemy Gates from inside{cr}- arrows cause more damage when fired from higher ground
